meanings.definition: Incorrect or unfair distribution of resources or wealth.
meanings.sent1: The maldistributions of food aid left many families hungry.
meanings.sent2: The government is investigating the maldistributions of funds in the charity organization.
meanings.sent3: The maldistributions of candy at the party caused some playful chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her maldistributions of attention among her children were like uneven rain in a dry field.
meanings.sent5: The maldistributions of toys among the children led to tears and arguments.

meanings.definition: The act of distributing something unfairly or improperly.
meanings.sent1: The maldistributions of tasks in the group project caused frustration.
meanings.sent2: The manager was accused of maldistributions of work assignments.
meanings.sent3: The maldistributions of chores among the siblings led to a comical mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her maldistributions of compliments were like scattered seeds on barren soil.
meanings.sent5: The maldistributions of prizes at the event left many participants disappointed.
